SCTX:
Begin sanvynScript

float currenthealth
float halfhealth
short gettinghealth
short nolore

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( gettinghealth == -1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "VA_Vamprich" > 10 )
		Journal "VA_VampRich" 90
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "VA_VampRich" >= 60 )
	if ( GetTarget Player == 1 )
		if ( gettinghealth == 0 )
			set currenthealth to ( player->GetHealth )
			set halfhealth to ( currenthealth * 0.5 )
			set gettinghealth to 1
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "VA_VampRich" >= 60 )
	if ( gettinghealth == 1 )
		if ( GetTarget Player == 1 )
			if ( player->GetHealth <= halfhealth )
				StopCombat Player
				Journal "VA_VampRich" 65
				ForceGreeting
				set gettinghealth to -1
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

end sanvynScript
